Title: Enacts the "independent senior housing resident freedom of choice act" to authorize persons in independent housing to receive services they could get at home
Summary: Enacts the "independent senior housing resident freedom of choice act" to authorize persons in independent housing, shelters and residences to receive services they could otherwise receive if they resided in a private residence.
LawCode: Amd ยง4651, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to establishing the independent senior housing resident freedom of choice act
